'}];var academyDB={categories:[{id:0,value:'servicios',label:'servicios mercadeo',color:blueGrey[500]},{id:1,value:'firebase',label:'servicios mercadeo2',color:amber[500]}],courses:[{id:'0123456789',title:'Tonly S.A.S',slug:'basics-of-typeScript',description:'Commits that need to be pushed lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.',category:'servicios',length:0,totalSteps:6,activeStep:0,updated:'Nov 01, 2017',steps:demoSteps},{id:'0123456790',title:'Mango System S.A.S',slug:'basics-of-typeScript',description:'Commits that need to be pushed lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.',category:'firebase',length:0,totalSteps:6,activeStep:0,updated:'Nov 01, 2020',steps:demoSteps}]};mock.onGet('/api/academy-app/categories').reply(function(){return[200,academyDB.categories];});mock.onGet('/api/academy-app/courses').reply(function(){return[200,academyDB.courses.map(function(_course){return _.omit(_course,['steps']);})];});mock.onGet('/api/academy-app/course').reply(function(request){var courseId=request.params.courseId;var response=_.find(academyDB.courses,{id:courseId});return[200,response];});mock.onPost('/api/academy-app/course/save').reply(function(request){var data=JSON.parse(request.data);var course=null;academyDB.courses=academyDB.courses.map(function(_course){if(_course.id===data.id){course=data;return course;}return _course;});if(!course){course=data;academyDB.courses=[].concat(_toConsumableArray(academyDB.courses),[course]);}return[200,course];});mock.onPost('/api/academy-app/course/update').reply(function(request){var data=JSON.parse(request.data);academyDB.courses=academyDB.courses.map(function(_course){if(_course.id===data.id){return _.merge(_course,data);}return _course;});return[200,data];});
